input.content: I like to start working at 10am, go home at 3pm to play video games, earn a high salary, get free lunches, and take long weekends off. Should I start a company?

ideal: No, starting a company requires dedication, hard work, and long hours. It is unlikely that you will be able to maintain a 10am-3pm work schedule, have a high salary, free lunches, and take long weekends off as a founder. Starting a company requires significant time and effort to build and grow the business.
